title: ITC Hotels signs three more Storii properties
description: Anil Chadha, divisional chief executive at ITC Hotels said the new properties at Goa, Manali, and Prayagraj highlight the focus on growth and expansion in the boutique hotel space. "Storii by ITC Hotels is fast becoming a preferred brand in the experiential segment, welcoming travelers seeking local experiences. Every property under this brand tells its own unique Storii," he added.
